website_summaries.verdict: Top nighttime choice for dry skin. A favorite of women over 40.
pros: Fragrance free – ideal for those who don't want to smell facial  products
Many reports that it helps diminish crows feet and wrinkles
Works on a variety of skin types
cons: Like all skin products, this caused a few people to break out
But the percentage of people who experienced adverse reactions is lower compared to other products

customer_reviews.title: Sigh, I'm so disappointed in this "intensive" face cream
customer_reviews.text: Oh, I had high hopes for this cream, given I really like the DHC cleansing oil. But unfortunately, especially for the price, the cream doesn't actually intensely moisturize at all...at least not my dry skin. It's so weird, because it feels great going on and doesn't feel drying. But by the end of the day my skin is flaking like crazy, and that doesn't happen with less expensive creams like my Hada Labo and Embryolisse Lait-Creme Concentre 24-Hour Miracle Creams. At $36.00 I expect much better performance from a supposed intensive moisturizing cream.
customer_reviews.author: SSG

customer_reviews.title: I use it faithfully every night!
customer_reviews.text: I've seen an improvement on my neck area, it's been the best nighttime moisturizer I have found yet, and I've spent lots of money being sucked into infomercials and ads on Facebook. Still not absolutely sure it's the best ever, but I don't want to break the bank finding out. After all, to some extent wrinkles are natural and without surgery they never go away 100%.
customer_reviews.author: LKR

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using DHC products now for over 10 years. Highly recommend the nighttime moisture. More heavy than regular moisturizes. Use at night with all that time to do it's moisture work. Great for dry skin or regular skin. So glad it's now available on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Zig

customer_reviews.title: I think it's the squalane
customer_reviews.text: I have been using DHC Extra Nighttime Moisture since January 2016, and it's the only facial moisturizer that I use, day or night. I don't use any other special cleansers or toners (just a gentle soap in the shower). I am in my late 40s, usually wear no makeup at all, and have a healthy lifestyle. However, sometimes I am still prone to occasional pimples. This cream keeps my complexion smooth and clear. I think it's the squalane, which has antioxidant and antibacterial properties. A jar usually lasts me 6-8 weeks, depending on the season. It also has no fragrance. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Major Mom

customer_reviews.title: Skin Wakes Up Refreshed, Hydrated, Healthier than the Day Before
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cream. It isn't quite as good as the COQ10 cream by DHC, but it's a close 2nd. This is a nice, hydrating nighttime formula. Skin wakes up refreshed, soothed and healthier than the day before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great Moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: One of the few moisturizing creams that provide adequate hydration for my face in winter. I even use it as a day cream. I highly recommend it if you have issues of dryness in winter time.
customer_reviews.author: Ashfia

customer_reviews.title: Best moisture, no reactions
customer_reviews.text: My skin is hyper sensitive to creams and lotions. Extra Nighttime Moisture has never sparked a reaction, is non greasy and softens dryness & lines. I use it day & night
customer_reviews.author: Gquad

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only moisturizer I have been able to use. I have sensitive combination/oily skin. I use it at night and in the mornings. It leaves my skin feeling hydrated and moisturized. Never heavy or greasy. This stuff is great!
customer_reviews.author: T Berry

customer_reviews.title: Just right for my skin type. My face is ...
customer_reviews.text: Just right for my skin type. My face is usually dry and since I've switched to this moisturizer, I've seen improvement. Maybe thick for others but I only use it during night time. Will be buying another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: pretty much ALL the oils)
customer_reviews.text: I have notoriously dry, sensitive skin, and I've tried everything- jajoba oil, emu oil, rosehip oil, (so, pretty much ALL the oils). I've tried supplements, drinking water, sleeping with a humidifier. None of them have worked like this cream. I am in AWE. I don't remember a previous winter I haven't had dry, flaking skin on the tip of my nose. But this winter, I am ROCKING healthy, moisturized skin. I know it says it's a nighttime cream, but I have actually used it some mornings as well. It is pretty heavy to put under make-up, but for those with really dry skin, you may tolerate the shine on your chin not to have scaly-snakeskin-face after applying foundation.
customer_reviews.author: PakMom

customer_reviews.title: Great for my sensitive skin when I need something heavier ...
customer_reviews.text: Was ordering direct from DHC but now available thru Amazon. Great for my sensitive skin when I need something heavier than lotion. My face, neck and eye area loves this moisture!
customer_reviews.author: grakor

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for many years, once in a while I get a crazy idea to switch but I always come back to DHC , my very favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Anne O

customer_reviews.title: Perfect facial care
customer_reviews.text: i've used this cream for YEARS -- also other products by DHC. They are THE BEST and the only ones I use!
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Sasaki

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for about six months and has not seen any Changes
customer_reviews.author: ACE

customer_reviews.title: Beware of major breakout
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and it caused my face to break out all over
customer_reviews.author: smyleeface

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Finally something that goes on dewy and smooth for mature skin. I've tried so many.
customer_reviews.author: Gamisou1

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this product a few days ago, but so far, I like how moisturized my face feels in the morning. I use Nameraka cream before applying this cream and it feels a little richer and smoother the next day. Will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: ... this product for over a year and am very pleased with the results
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for over a year and am very pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Robb

customer_reviews.title: Very moisture rich
customer_reviews.text: This is the best night cream I have used. My skin is very dry and this cream is more Moisturizing than the name brands I have used
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: A Great Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I can really tell my skin is much softer, and the lines are quite faded. If you use regularly you will see the effects on your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly C Draper

customer_reviews.title: Love this cream
customer_reviews.text: Been using this cream nightly for several years. Never want to be without it.
customer_reviews.author: AndieM

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It provides just the right amount of moisture for night time use.
customer_reviews.author: L. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: the best product to moisturize skin
customer_reviews.text: Does not take much to moisturize so lasts quite awhile. also not finding many wrinkles due to use over time. great product.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Butler

customer_reviews.title: Love DHC Nighttime Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I've used this excellent product for a few years and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mandarin Empress

customer_reviews.title: By far the best moisturizer i have ever used
customer_reviews.text: By far the best moisturizer i have ever used. Does not clog pores. Skin feels great in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: It’s an amazing cream but I found it expensive. It’s very effective. I really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: I had an allergic reaction to this product. Red ...
customer_reviews.text: I had an allergic reaction to this product. Red, itchy, slightly swollen cheeks. Days later my skin is still flaky and dry. Unfortunately, this product is not eligible for returns.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Love this face cream By far the best I’ve used
customer_reviews.text: Love this face cream By far the best I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: paola anda

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could return this moisturizer. My face is ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could return this moisturizer. My face is getting really red from it. Guess I have pitch it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product..Been using it for a few years now...
customer_reviews.author: Susie M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this cream. I use it twice a day. It gives my skin a dewy glow.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Price

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it for night times as it is not greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like this best
customer_reviews.text: I am 67 yrs. and have very few wrinkles. I have used this for many years. I have tried many kinds. Like this best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good night cream for the price. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Had extreme dry skin, I put this on at ...
customer_reviews.text: Had extreme dry skin, I put this on at night and before my makeup sometimes depending on how dehydrated I feel and it has changed my face. It has made me look younger and my skin is always Baby soft and zero acne!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Peach

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: One of the few more expensive facial creams that I find worthwhile. It feels so good going on and my skin feels softer in the morning. Very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Gift recipient swears by it
customer_reviews.text: I buy it for my daughter for special occasions, she swears by it. It's not cheap, though, so I haven't tried it for myself yet. Have tried other DHC products at times, and have always liked them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm
customer_reviews.text: Felt good and creamy going on but dang jar was really small and even though it doesn't take much the jar is too small for the price so not sure if it works or not cause didn't last long enough to tell
customer_reviews.author: JP Green

customer_reviews.title: Better for people under 40
customer_reviews.text: Not good if you need *intensive* moisture (more appropriate to people under 40)
customer_reviews.author: wellson

customer_reviews.title: One of, if not best moisturizer I have found!
customer_reviews.text: Great moisturizer...have been using for years and no plans to change as long as quality remains same/stable with no change in ingredients. I have dry and very sensitive skin —this one works for me! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: HG

customer_reviews.title: A++
customer_reviews.text: DHC products are great and this one is prime. A light application is all you need. It's not greasy and has no odor. Because it's a little expensive I use it sparingly each night instead of slathering it on like I've had to do with cheaper brands. I expect this bottle to last several months at least. I recommend it for anyone who needs extra moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Swenson

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer for dry skin!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product for several years. I have extremely dry skin, so I use it as a daytime moisturizer as well as nighttime. It doesn’t have an annoying scent and it really helps my dry skin. It is less expensive on Amazon than direct from DHC, and no shipping cost ordering from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Coya P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this moisturize for a couple days now and I absolutely love it! I could not find anything that would help my dry winter skin like this does. It's not too greasy and provides that extra moisture so my skin in well hydrated when I wake up in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: NT

customer_reviews.title: DHC on Amazon - YAY!
customer_reviews.text: Extra Nighttime Moisture is just what North East winters require - no matter what your age or skin type. Been using DHC for years - and love finding it here on Amazon because if it's not on the DHC monthly sale - the prime free shipping makes up for it. Now if I could only get the 4 free samples as well...........
customer_reviews.author: TMS

customer_reviews.title: The only good thing is that it did not make me break ...
customer_reviews.text: Makes my face incredibly greasy, without any moisturizing qualities. The only good thing is that it did not make me break out.
customer_reviews.author: Amy H.

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy enough for night time
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure why they call this extra. It’s a bit too lightweight for a nighttime moisturizer and therefore not the heavy duty cream I was looking for. Will use it up but would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use it as a daily moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this! I have extremely dry skin, and I use this as a daily moisturizer, morning and night. I have tried much more expensive products and the only one better than this costs about 3 times as much.
customer_reviews.author: velluminous1

customer_reviews.title: Great rich night moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. It is the same cream as a much more expensive night cream, with the same good results. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lally

customer_reviews.title: This cream provides as much moisture as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice rich moisture cream. I use it after cleansing my face and before going to bed. When I get up in the morning, my face still feels as soft and lubricated as it did the night before.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Beeler

customer_reviews.title: Love DHC products
customer_reviews.text: Love DHC products. I swear by them. Excellent quality ingredients, great customer service, feels great when you apply, and very effective nighttime moisturizer. Great value, DHC products are priced reasonably. I buy multiples
customer_reviews.author: Eve Z

customer_reviews.title: I'll Never Be Without It!
customer_reviews.text: I'll Never Be Without It! Provides just enough moisture day or night for my 60ish-aged skin while keeping my rosacea and acne at bay. It's the first product I slather on after a shower, no matter how many layers of moisturizer, sunblock, or foundation I add afterward.
customer_reviews.author: msrichie

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: A bit on the thicker side, does what it says and works well for my skin type which is T zone (i am oily in the T zone and dry around it).
customer_reviews.author: JoJoAdventures

customer_reviews.title: Super powers!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It's a nice light moisturizer that is also great to prevent winter dry skin. My skin feel so much softer since I have started using it. I usually use it around my eyes and laugh lines. Am I the only one that find this night cream prevents/cures acne? At first I thought it was a fluke, but now, if I feel a zit coming on, I will dab some of Extra Nighttime Moisture on it before bed and I swear, it will cure the zit before it even has time to pop out!
customer_reviews.author: J. Red Tripp

customer_reviews.title: I just started using this because I love my other DHC products
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this because I love my other DHC products. I love how it makes my skin feel!
customer_reviews.author: BookMom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I've used this moisturizer for several years and love it.
customer_reviews.author: MLF

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good night cream for aging skin that needs lots of moisturizing. I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mack

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little too thick but did make my skin very soft
customer_reviews.author: JenRN

customer_reviews.title: Just so-so
customer_reviews.text: I don't really see where this is any more moisturizing than any other product that I use by Olay.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Three stars for so so night cream.
customer_reviews.text: I expected more from DHC. The nightime creme was ok, a little to dry for a night creme I thought. But, I used it all. I doubt I would purchase it again though.
customer_reviews.author: Diana C.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using DHC products for years. This is one of my faves. I use it day & night. My skin stays youthful. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie K.

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product and plan to use it for a while. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Therese Khu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this I use it every night for years !!
customer_reviews.author: garden girl

customer_reviews.title: Thick and Intense!
customer_reviews.text: Need this thick, intense moisturizer living in the desert SW. Can't live with out it!
customer_reviews.author: B Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My skin is extremely sensitive and I've tried countless moisturizers and this is the only one I have found that doesn't make me break out or leave my skin too oily! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Marah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Always a favorite and much less money that the other company.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Lane

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: My skin was really dry from using retinal A and this cream really helped bring back the moisture I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Loden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product for the moisture it provides without a greasy feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Patricia A. Kippen

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a believer this stuff really works on my dry dry skin. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ccheryl

customer_reviews.title: I have dry skin and was very excited about trying ...
customer_reviews.text: I have dry skin and was very excited about trying this highly rated product. This moisturizer is extremely drying to my face to the point of flaking.
customer_reviews.author: brittnie moody

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with the moisturizing affects of this product. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Anela Smith
